description: Aria is part of the Element 4 group as well as it strongest member. He is a very large man that towers over the other members. Despite his large appearance he seems to cry a lot. Aria`s magic is called Drain which drains it`s opponent of his or her magic power. Once it`s drained it floats in the air and eventually disappears. The greater the magic power of the opponent the more damage Drain causes. His power is so great that he has to keep his eyes closed to contan it and only opens them for the strongest of opponents. His nickname within the guild is Aria of the Sky. Aria is Italian for "air".
name: Aria
